avalancheActivity.highlights: Considerable snow accumulation in isolated areas. The snow cover can be unstable and new wind slabs have formed in variable aspects in isolated areas especially in the high mountains.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow has accumulated in rather light winds, followed by heavy winds in the high mountains in varying directions. Considerable accumulation can be expected in isolated locations. Windslabs may have formed on top of loose snow. Older snow underwent a lasting thaw and rain period and is stable. Wind slabs may have formed in gullies and lows in all aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow in most places, on top of older wind slab or hard packed snow. A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow in most places, on top of older wind slab or hard packed snow. A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.

weatherForecast.highlights: Fremur hægur vindur og kalt. Talsvert úrkomu á mánudagskvöld.

avalancheActivity.comment: On Sunday, many small avalanches fell on Súðavíkurhlíð, and two fell in Súgundafjörður.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Small avalanches are possible in the new snow. The risk of avalanches may increase quickly if more wind comes than is currently predicted.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A significant amount of snow fell in calm W to NW winds in recent days. Much of the snow has accumulated in the lowlands with less in the mountains.  If the wind increases then snow could accumulate quickly in gullies, leading to heightened avalanche danger. The underlying snow is generally considered stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow in most places, on top of older wind slab or hard packed snow. A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow in most places, on top of older wind slab or hard packed snow. A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæg vindur og kalt. Éljagangur á mánudag og þriðjudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: One rather small avalanche fell in Siglufjarðarskarð by Siglufjörður on Monday 20.01. The avalanche did not reach the ski track.
avalancheActivity.highlights: A lot of new snow is in the area, on top of older wind slabs.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Considerable snow is in the area. Wind slabs were present before, especially on W-facing aspects. Snow pit from Siglufjörður 21.01. showed stiff wind slab ontop of older stiffer firn, CP fractured between layers with medium force at 38 cm depth. Faceting grains were found near bottom of pit between firn layers, like pit on 10.Jan.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow in most places, on top of older wind slab or hard packed snow. A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow in most places, on top of older wind slab or hard packed snow. A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hægar breytilegar áttir og snjókoma með köflum. Áfram kalt í veðri en hlýnar á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.Many avalances released during a swarm at the beginning of last week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow is in the area after snowfall in recent days. Wind slabs are widely in the mountains and could be on most aspects

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow is in the area after snowfall in recent days. Wind slabs are widely in the mountains and could be on most aspects. Considerable snow is in gullies. A snowpit from Oddsskarð on Jan 26 showes a layered snowpack, which fractured at 20 cm with moderate to hard loading.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow in most places, on top of older wind slab or hard packed snow. A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow in most places, on top of older wind slab or hard packed snow. A few small avalanches have released in the new snow.

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytilegar vindáttir næstu daga og dálítil snjókoma á þriðjudag. Áframhaldandi frost til fjalla.
